translations.key: Please select a file to upload
The mode suggests that external categories are displayed as original ones
The mode suggests that only internal categories are displayed
The mode suggests that no categories are displayed
Please copy required code in field
number of elements to be displayed in blocks
Numeric field. The recommended number of items to be displayed is from 4 to 8, news is 3
To be displayed on the left side of website header. Recommended image size is 300px by 100px. Recommended image format is png with transparent background, valid image formats are gif and jpg.
Promotional text displayed on all pages in the header of the site
At least one category setting must be set
Navigation menu display mode. Options are: Display all menu items, Display menu items up to the second level, Hide the entire side menu
Layout of website blocks. The default is for left to right text direction. The right to left text direction is desirable for the following languages: Arabic, Persian, Yiddish, Urdu
Display showcase items by category on the home page. Options: As carousel (in one line with scrolling arrows), As list (in several rows)
Do you really want delete category from set?
Custom code for the head section of the template
Custom code for the head section of the template
Mail in the header of the site
Custom html code at end of body
Custom html code at end of body
Links to external sites tab Photo and description (links to Taobao, 1688 etc.)
The selected category will be displayed in the catalog and will be available for search
External categories are displayed as original ones
External categories are displayed as original ones
Only internal categories are displayed. Only categories from the Categories section in the website's admin area will be displayed on the categories page and be available for search
Categories aren't displayed in exchange to increased search performance
The subcategories of the current level will be displayed
Default quantity of items to be displayed

It is recommended that you select one of the following values: 20, 40, 100. The quantity of items to be displayed on a page. If the number of goods exceeds the specified quantity they will be displayed on the next page and in pagination as well. Note: the more items are displayed on a page, the slower the page is.
A range of page numbers to display in pagination
It is recommended that you set a value from 1 to 5. On the catalog page below the list of goods pagination is provided to show the number of pages with the given item accessible for review
Contact information at the header beside the logo
Add code received in on-line chat service you have selected to communicate with customers.
Required to be enabled if "payment in cash" option is provided in addition to other payment methods
Hide middle name field during user registration, in profile.
This option provides a choice to the client: display or hide the receipt
Open payment page in new window
A payment system will be opened in new browser window
Email address to send order notifications, payment notifications and customer's withdrawal requests to(can be several by ; division)
Email address to be specified in the notification "From" field
The option allows you either to keep or to reject the original package of an item. It is applied to entire order
The package was successfuly exported to delivery service
The percentage is calculated from the total value of the goods in order and added to the cost of delivery. The range is from 1 to 99%
Taobao's temporary discontinued items are allowed for sale
Items not from the Collections Selector
Allow the sale of any products other than those selected in the Collections Selector
Items restricted to be displayed in Restrictions section on the home page
Items with not yet known quantity in stock are allowed for sale
Hide restricted items on the website
An item added to the Restrictions section won't be displayed
Making order is not allowed in case Zip/Postal code field is empty
Russian Central Bank Identifier Code (8 or 9 digits)
The Multilingual module allows you to create different language versions of the website.

Here one can select a language in which goods on the home page will be displayed (showcase items). A language can be selected from the drop-down list on the right side of the page. Editing selected languages can be done on the left side of the page.
The default translation from "langs" folder in the website root is loaded.
If translation haves html tags, turn on tick
Do you really want to return the default translation?
If there are signs of package damage make sure to verify that its contents are OK!
"Enabled" means setting the website offline for maintenance. Default: disabled
URL to redirect a customer after authorization
Lets to place orders without prior registration, with specifying user email at the last stage of ordering
Enter captcha when sign in into admin panel
Additional bruteforce password protection for admin panel
Enabling additional site protection against spam
Your public key for Google reCAPTCHA
Inbound email address for error notifications
The email address to be specified in "from" field in emails (notifications)to customers
The version is compatible with your system
The version is incompatible with your system. Updating is not advisable.
This delivery method is not avalilable
Recalculate the price of the goods at the purchase price/delivery
Available delivery methods (advisable by your logistician)
State/Province/Region is selected where your logistician is located)
The minimum weight of a parcel
The minimum allowable weight of a parcel
The maximum weight of a parcel
The maximum allowable weight of a parcel

The parcel weight is rounded up using the specified weight-step. For example, a parcel weight is 2 kg 678 g. A weight-step is 0,2 kg. It follows that the final parcel weight will be 2,8 kg. Delivery fee will be calculated for the parcel weight of 2,8 kg (not for 2,678 kg)
Allow for the minimum delivery fee
If the checkbox is not set, the initial cost specified in the delivery price will be ignored
If a checkbox is checked a parcel weight is rounded up with the accuracy of weight-step.
Round up to the nearest whole number
If included rounding then the weight will be rounded up to step delivery. If not included rounding is calculated per gram step without delivery

The number of messages that the server sends in one part. Due to the restrictions on sending a large number of emails simultaneously, a queue is usually created, which is sent out by the server in parts. The default value is 5. The recommended maximum value is 100.
Day quota of newsletter. Number of messages that will be sent daily. The default value is 100.
Set a number of reviews on the main page (by default it is empty and reviews are not shown on the main page).
Statistics on the service calls of today will be available tomorrow!

The term of activity of the referrer (specified in days)
The term after which the referrer ceases to be invited and the percentage from it is no longer charged

This collection is automatically filled using statistics and is not intended for manual control. When you remove goods out of this collection, they fall into block list for not re-appearing in statistics, and will be banned everywhere, unless you exclude them from block list.

PHP module is configured as CGI. For proper authentication in the file .htacces must have:

RewriteCond %{HTTP:Authorization} ^Basic.*

RewriteRule (.*) index.php?authorization=%{HTTP:Authorization} [QSA,L]
